divs: Sighting DetailsI was riding passanger in a car going home with a friend. Looking up at a jet, trying to figure out its complexities a bright and shining star appeared next to it. The sky was a blue, pink, (30 prior to darkeness-sundown) The light had no flashing or indication of being a reflective light off a planet, comet, satalite, ect... It was clearly in our stratusphere, looked like a star, but wasnt, I looked all over the sky for something similure that I might write if off as, nothing out side of the blue of the sky was visible. I started hollering and shouting at my friend to notice it, and she had noticed it and we couldnt explain it. It was there for about 5 seconds, longer accourding to my friend who saw it appear briefly prior to its reappearing where I saw it. It disappeared, just ceased to exist after that 5 second period.
Summary: Sationary light appears next to jet for 5 seconds over Jackson Michigan.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Summit
This sighting has never been favorited.
